name: Keyboard Olympics
description:
Instructions

Use your physical keyboard to control the in-game keyboard! Press and hold to charge, and release to pop up and bounce things away. Just that easy.

For the best experience, please use an N-key rollover (NKRO) keyboard.

Local 2-player PVP

Share one keyboard and try to take control! The Red player stays left, and the Blue player stays right. Feel free to use all the keys even if you reach your opponent's territory!

 

Credit

Lead Programmer - Haotian Chen
Lead Designer - Blaer Zhang
Lead Artist - David Fang
